knimeNode.name: Numeric Binner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Groups values of numeric columns into string-type categories.

fullDescription.intro: Groups values of numeric columns into string-type categories. For each column a number of intervals (bins) can be defined. Each of these bins has a unique name (for this column), a range, and open or closed interval borders. It automatically ensures that the ranges are defined in descending order and that interval borders are consistent. In addition, each column can be either replaced with the binned, string-type column or a new binned, string-type column is appended.
fullDescription.option: First select a column and then use the "Add" button to create the desired number of bins. Each bin can be modified in the lower part of the panel once it has been selected. Each interval has to be defined independently or can be removed using the "Removed" button. Note that the range as well as bin borders are automatically adjusted, if necessary.
If selected, a new column name can be specified. This name is used to append a new binned column. The input column is kept.

ports.dataIn: Data with the columns to bin
